_header: Jesu Lord in Trinity / That was and is and ay shall be
Title(s): Miracle of the Virgin Mary, the Wicked Knight and the Friar
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; miracles; friars
_description: Miracle of the Virgin Mary, the Wicked Knight and the Friar — in 12-line stanzas (aabccbddbeeb)

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Ihesu lorde in trinyteÞat was & es and aye schall
                    be…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…Þus Endis here our talkyngIhesu till h blysse
                    vs bryngeÞat es euer lastande
Lincoln91.Note:
Only lines 1-97 and last 43 lines due to loss of folios between 147 and
                    148; part of f. 147 torn away with loss of text;nineteenth-century transcript in
                        London,  British Library Egerton 2257, f. 95.
Lincoln91.Editions:
Brewer,  Derek Stanley,  and  A. E. B. Owen.  
             “Introduction.” 
             The Thornton Manuscript (Lincoln Cathedral MS. 91).
         London: Scolar Press, 1975. 
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 503-4.
